definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Order a coke with a meal only if determined to upset the waiter.
sentences.chinese: 除非你想令侍應生不快，否則點餐時別配以可樂。

sentences.english: I’ll be a bartender or get work through a temp agency.
sentences.chinese: 我可以做侍應生或者通過短工中介找到工作。

sentences.english: You are our new cabin-boy; pleased I am to see you.
sentences.chinese: 你是我們船上新來的侍應生，見到你真高興。

sentences.english: The restaurant started me in as a waiter.
sentences.chinese: 這家餐館一開始僱我作侍應生。

sentences.english: Life as a waiter, not so bad thinking about it in isolation.
sentences.chinese: 侍應生的生活，單獨考慮也沒有那麼糟糕。

definition: Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
to eat one's fill/to be full
drinking party/to go on a binge/to paint the town red
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
Wantan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
